items.title: Make an Open Source Drone

visible_instructors.job_title: Educator and Author of "Maker Education Revolution".
visible_instructors.name: Dr. Peter
visible_instructors.title: Dr. Peter Dalmaris

visible_instructors.job_title: AI - Computer Vision Engineer & Drone Technology Specialist
visible_instructors.name: Vasanthraja
visible_instructors.title: Vasanthraja A

items.headline: A fun project in which you learn about drones by making one. Use the Pixhawk or Multiwii AIO flight controllers
objectives_summary: Understand the different types of multi-rotor drones.
Understand flight terminology.
Understand the principles of drone flight.

items.title: How To Build a Computer: A Beginner's Guide
items.headline: Build a computer from scratch, while learning about each component and how they work along the way.
objectives_summary: Build your first computer from scratch!
Gain a basic knowledge of PC components and how they interact!
Learn how to shop for components that have a high dollar-to-performance ratio!

items.title: Learning Cisco Unified Computing System - UCS
items.headline: Your guide to complete mastery over Cisco's UCS!
objectives_summary: Identify common UCS components
Describe and configure service profiles
Describe and configure UCS pools

items.title: Learn the Fundamentals of VHDL and FPGA Development
items.headline: You will learn how to start with VHDL and FPGA Programming.
objectives_summary: Understand the design process for implementing a digital design onto a FPGA
Learn how to simulate a design in Altera’s ModelSim and Vivado SImulator
Learn how to use Xilinx Vivado tool to program FPGA

items.title: Computer Basics for the Simple Beginner
items.headline: A guide for new computer users or those who want to know more to get started with the basics!
objectives_summary: Know what Windows is
How to operate Windows
Common Terms

items.title: Arduino Bootcamp : Learning Through Projects

visible_instructors.job_title: Electrical and Software Engineer, University Instructor
visible_instructors.title: Lee Assam
visible_instructors.name: Lee

items.headline: Build 15+ complete Arduino projects from scratch, a car controlled using an app, cell phone, games, LEDs, sensors, sound
objectives_summary: Build  a remote-controlled car you can drive with a smart phone app
Build your own cell phone that you can make/receive calls and send/receive text messages with
Build games using the Arduino incorporating light, sound and joystick controllers

items.title: Introduction to Internet of Things(IoT) using Arduino
items.headline: Learn how to implement the communication between smartphones and also to control various home appliances wirelessly.
objectives_summary: Receive data from Arduino over Bluetooth serial using HC-06 Bluetooth module.
Send voice commands to Arduino.
Implement the communication between smart phones and home appliances.

items.title: Advanced AC Drive- VFD, Servo & Stepper - Powerflex & Delta
items.headline: Learn programming and PLC Interfacing of Allen Bradley & Delta AC Drives - VFD and Servo by LIVE Examples
objectives_summary: To program the VFD and Servo with customize parameter suitable to the application
To design turn key circuit for VFD's and Servo Drives
To interface VFD's and Servo with PLC for intelligent operation

items.title: IEC Paradigms (Level 4)
items.headline: Functional Block Diagrams, Sequential Function Charts, Instruction Lists, Ladder Diagrams and Structured Text
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, students will be able to program nearly ANY modern PLC regardless of mfg.
Students will be knowledgeable AND experienced with all five IEC programming paradigms.
Students will know how to lay out a complex PLC program

items.title: ARM Cortex M Microcontroller DMA Programming Demystified

visible_instructors.job_title: Works on Firmware and Embedded Engineering
visible_instructors.title: FastBit Embedded Brain Academy
visible_instructors.name: FastBit Embedded

items.headline: Direct Memory Access Demystified with STM32 Peripherals (ADC, SRAM,UART,M2M,M2P,P2M) and Embedded C code Exercises
objectives_summary: Please watch free preview videos you will learn something today without even enrolling for this course
Fundamentals of Direct Memory Access in a Microcontroller
The Microcontroller Architecture and Bus interfaces

items.title: Centrifugal pumps : Principles , Operation and Design
items.headline: A complete understanding of construction details and functioning of centrifugal pumps for successful plant operation
objectives_summary: Understand centrifugal pumps working principles for successful operation of your plant and piping systems
Understand centrifugal pumps construction details (impeller, volute, shaft, bearings, packing, mechanical seals, etc)
Lear how to read and interpret your pump curves

items.title: FPGA Embedded Design, Part 1 - Verilog
items.headline: Learn FPGA embedded application design starting with the basics and leaving with your own working designs.
objectives_summary: Design hardware behavior with the Verilog Hardware Description Language
Simulate Verilog Modules.
The curriculum will take you by the hand through learning Verilog.

items.title: Learn Vivado from Top to Bottom - Your Complete Guide
items.headline: The complete guide for implementing designs on Xilinx FPGAs using Vivado Design Suite, for beginners and advanced users
objectives_summary: Use Vivado confidently and proficiently.
Understand the steps required to take their FPGA design from start to finish.
Implement a micro blaze softcore processor on their FPGA.

items.title: Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS) From Ground Up™ on ARM 1
items.headline: Build Your Own RealTime Operating Systems from first principles . Practice on STM32 and TIVA C boards
objectives_summary: Build a Real-Time Operating System from Scratch
Build Round-Robin Schedulers
Build Cooperative Schedulers

items.title: Complete ARM Cortex-M Bare-Metal Programming (TM4C123)
items.headline: No Libraries used : Cortex-M Internals,  Master Pointers, Structures, Memory Navigation, Debugging, CMSIS,Assembly etc
objectives_summary: Be able write firmware using bare-metal embedded-c
Write Embedded programs using just pointers and and memory addresses
Write more professional and efficient Embedded programs.

items.title: Build your own GPS tracking system-Raspberry Pi Zero W 2021
items.headline: Installation, setup & configuration, Static IP, GPS Testing, Remote GUI, location tracking on Google Map, IoT & more
objectives_summary: Design your own advanced data streaming and visualization tool to view the detailed tracking information of the moving vehicle.
Develop a complete IOT based GPS system to track the real-time movement of the vehicle in the web dashboard.
Code in Python and extract the required information from the GPS module.
